text: (oru nāḷaṉṟu) ekiptiṉ aracar (taṉ piratāṉikaḷai nōkki) ‘‘eṉ piratāṉikaḷē! Koḻuttup parutta ēḻu pacukkaḷai, iḷaittu vaṟṟiya ēḻu pacukkaḷ pucippatākavum, naṉku viḷainta pacumaiyāṉa ēḻu katirkaḷaiyum kāyntu ularnta (cāviyāṉa vēṟu ēḻu) katirkaḷaiyum eṉ kaṉavil kaṇṭēṉ. Eṉ piratāṉikaḷē! Nīṅkaḷ kaṉavukaḷukku viyākkiyāṉam kūṟakkūṭiyavarkaḷāka iruntāl eṉ ikkaṉaviṉ palaṉai aṟiviyuṅkaḷ'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉār
